item.title: EV Technologies in India: Explained for Everyday Car Buyers
item.description: Electric vehicles, or EVs, are no longer just a luxury or a futuristic dream. In India, they are becoming more and more common on city roads, in neighborhoods, and even in tier-2 and tier-3 towns. From electric scooters to high-end electric SUVs, the market is buzzing with options. But let’s be honest—buying an EV can be a bit confusing, especially when you’re trying to understand all the technical stuff.
